import React from "react"; function List({ employees, handleEdit, handleDelete }) { const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US", { style: "currency", currency: "USD", minimumFractionDigits: null, }); return (
{employees.length > 0 ? ( employees.map((employee, i) => ( )) ) : ( )}
No. First Name Last Name Email Salary Date Position Actions
{i + 1} {employee.firstName} {employee.lastName} {employee.email} {formatter.format(employee.salary)} {employee.date} {employee.position}
No Employees
); } export default List;
